name: Breathless (itch) (Saschanian)
description:
NOTE: Welder Bug still occurs when played in browser.

Your A.I. found another habitable planet. Is this one going to be the one? After weeks in your escape pod I finally hope for salvation on this glowing red planet. But first you have to reach it.

In Breathless you take the role of a desperate space ship captain who lost his ship and is trying to find a habitable planet to land on with his escape pod. Your only remaining companion is Matthew, your personal A.I.. You now have to keep the ship running and fix it up on the go long enough to be able to reach the nearest planet. 10 minutes won´t be that hard, right?
